Class StreamHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intowow.sdk.StreamHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbsListView.OnScrollListener, com.intowow.sdk.interfaces.ADHelperListener

    public class StreamHelper
extends Object
implements com.intowow.sdk.interfaces.ADHelperListener, AbsListView.OnScrollListener
    this class is help the APP to request and control the In-Stream ad

      • onADLoaded

        public void onADLoaded(String requestKey,
              com.intowow.sdk.model.ADProfile profile)
        when the SDK loads the ad successfully, it will call this callback for getting the position which you have added in the DataSet. if you call getStreamAd in the getView(), the SDK will return the ad refer to this position. if you return "-1", it means that the ad is not added in your DataSet
        Specified by:
        onADLoaded in interface com.intowow.sdk.interfaces.ADHelperListener
        Parameters:
        requestKey - requestKey
        profile - the ad profile

      • onFailed

        public void onFailed(com.intowow.sdk.model.ADProfile profile,
            int errorCode)
        when the SDK loads the ad fail, it will call this callback
        Specified by:
        onFailed in interface com.intowow.sdk.interfaces.ADHelperListener
        Parameters:
        profile - the ad profile
        errorCode - error code
